title: Paranormal Adventures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/22/21
itunes:title: Paranormal Adventures - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/22/21
description:
George Noory and author Jeff Belanger explore his wide ranging paranormal investigations, including vampires, the Amityville Horror haunted house and the boy whose story inspired the book and movie "The Exorcist."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
